patterns: Is exercise helpful for mental health?
responses: Regular exercise, even a simple 30-minute walk each day, can improve both mental and physical health. It’s a great way to boost your mood and energy.

Listening to music, exercising outdoors, or trying a group class can make workouts more enjoyable. Find what you love to do, and it’ll be easier to keep going.
